field.name: OtherType

definition.attribution: Digital Learning Sciences at the University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

field.definition: The nature or genre of the resource not described by a controlled vocabulary.

dos.practice: Use this field to augment the selected gemType and dcmiType terms or as an alternative field if no gemType or dcmiType terms apply.
The otherType element is intended to contain statements about the genre of resource being described.
Use separate otherType elements to enter multiple types.

donts.practice: The type element should not be used to make statements about the physical format of the resource being described. Use format instead.

The type element should not be used to contain genre information about resources related to the one being described. For example, if the resource being described is a collection record for a set of lesson plans (i.e., a collection-level record), it should have the value "collection" assigned to the type element but "lesson plan" should not be assigned since the resource itself is not actually a lesson plan.
